data.name: Recollection Demo
data.detailed_description:
A short and atmospheric walking’n’watching simulator about cherishing the familiar.
So many things we take for granted and don't even notice anymore in our everyday routines.
But there is beauty all around us, we just need to pay attention.
Rediscover that beauty and appreciate fascinating things like the moon, clouds and trees anew in intimate experiences.

Demo contents:
  • Three things to discover and experience: The moon, the stars and the mountains
  • Atmospheric silhouette artstyle
  • Casual, accessible gameplay
  • Short playtime of about 5 - 10 min
  • Sneak peek of second game mode
data.about_the_game:
A short and atmospheric walking’n’watching simulator about cherishing the familiar.

data.short_description: All the same, all the time. Day in, day out. But maybe there is more, if you just look close enough, and remember. A short, calm and atmospheric walking’n’watching simulator about cherishing the familiar.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) / 10 / 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
